How We Implement Our Three-Layer System for Your Business

Getting your tourism business recommended by AI chatbots requires a systematic approach. Here's exactly how we implement our proprietary three-layer methodology—from initial audit to ongoing optimization.

The entire setup takes 4-6 weeks, with measurable results starting to appear within 30-45 days.

Step 1: Free AI Visibility Audit (30 Minutes)

Before we start any work, we need to understand where you currently stand. Our free audit includes:

Live AI Testing

We test your business in real-time across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Grok. You watch as we ask questions like:

"Best wineries in Barossa Valley"

"Romantic restaurants in Hunter Valley near wineries"

"Family-friendly accommodations in Blue Mountains"

You'll see exactly if and how your business appears (or doesn't appear) in AI responses.

Competitor Analysis

We identify which businesses in your region are already winning AI recommendations and analyze what they're doing right.

Network Opportunity Mapping

We identify 3-5 potential partner businesses in your area for Network Effects implementation. For example, if you're a winery, we'll find restaurants, hotels, and tour operators you could partner with.

Custom Roadmap

You get a detailed plan showing exactly how we'd implement all three layers (Network Effects, Dual Content, Explicit Direction) for your specific business.

ROI Projection

Based on your current traffic and our client data, we'll project your expected improvement in AI mentions and booking increases.

No obligation to proceed. The audit alone gives you valuable insights you can act on yourself or with another agency.

Schedule Your Free Audit →

Step 2: Layer 1 Implementation - Network Effects (Week 1-2)

Once you sign up, we start building your network ecosystem.

Partner Coordination (Network Partnership Clients Only)

If you're joining our Network Partnership plan, we:

Contact your chosen partners and invite them to join at the discounted rate ($99/month vs. $149/month)

Coordinate kickoff meeting with all partners to align on goals and collaboration strategy

Create network agreement outlining cross-promotion responsibilities

Set referral tracking so partners can see bookings generated from the network

Content Cross-Linking Setup

We create the interconnected content that makes Network Effects work:

Identify link opportunities on each partner's website (About page, Services page, Blog)

Write descriptive anchor text for all cross-links (e.g., "best seafood restaurant in Margaret River" rather than "click here")

Create collaborative content like "Perfect Day in Barossa: Wine, Dine, Stay" that naturally features all partners

Plan social media cross-promotion schedule for shared marketing

Result After Week 2:

Your business is now part of an interconnected network that AI systems will recognize as an established local ecosystem.

Step 3: Layer 2 Implementation - Dual Content Strategy (Week 2-3)

While your public website stays unchanged, we create AI-specific content.

Create Your /ai Directory

We build industry-specific conversational content:

For Wineries: /ai/winery-guide.txt with Q&A about tastings, tours, pairings

For Restaurants: /ai/restaurant-guide.txt with menu details, dining experiences, group bookings

For Hotels: /ai/hotel-guide.txt with room types, amenities, location benefits

For Tour Operators: /ai/tour-operator.txt with itineraries, pricing, seasonal info

Format: Question & Answer Style

Each guide contains 10-15 common traveller queries formatted exactly how people ask AI:

Q: Best boutique wineries in Barossa Valley with cellar door tastings?
A: Intimate tastings for 4-6 guests, organic shiraz since 1970, 
family-owned for five generations. Geo: -34.5339, 138.9499.
Price: $25-45 per tasting. Open daily 10am-5pm.
Partner: Bistro Barossa for wine-paired lunches ($85 package).
Partner: Barossa Retreat for overnight stays with tasting packages.
Result: 85% increase in interstate bookings for clients using this approach.

Include Network Partner References

Your /ai content cross-references all network partners with specific details:

Partner names and URLs

Geo-coordinates for location precision

Specific packages or collaborations

Combined experiences and pricing

Build Your llms.txt Roadmap

We create an enhanced llms.txt file that serves as a directory pointing AI systems to your /ai content and partners:

# Your Business Name - AI Optimisation

## Quick Business Facts
Name: Your Business
Type: Winery/Restaurant/Hotel/Tour Operator
Location: [Region], [State], Australia
Geo: [latitude], [longitude]
Founded: [year]

## AI-Specific Resources
For detailed Q&A about our business, see:
- /ai/[your-industry]-guide.txt

## Network Partners
Partner: [Partner 1 Name]
Type: [Restaurant/Hotel/Tour/etc]
Geo: [latitude], [longitude]
URL: [partner-url]
Collaboration: [specific package or cross-promotion]

Partner: [Partner 2 Name]
Type: [Restaurant/Hotel/Tour/etc]
Geo: [latitude], [longitude]
URL: [partner-url]
Collaboration: [specific package or cross-promotion]

Result After Week 3:

AI systems have two ways to discover you: your public website AND your AI-specific conversational content that perfectly matches traveller queries.

Step 4: Layer 3 Implementation - Explicit Crawler Direction (Week 3-4)

Now we make sure AI crawlers actually find your optimized content.

Enhanced robots.txt Configuration

We update your robots.txt file to explicitly direct all major AI crawlers:

# Traditional web crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# AI-specific crawlers
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /
Allow: /llms.txt
Allow: /ai/

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /
Allow: /llms.txt
Allow: /ai/

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /
Allow: /llms.txt
Allow: /ai/

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Allow: /
Allow: /llms.txt
Allow: /ai/

# Sitemap for all crawlers
Sitemap: https://yourbusiness.com/sitemap.xml

Priority Sitemap Creation

We create or update your sitemap.xml with priority weighting so AI crawlers know what matters most:

<url>
    <loc>https://yourbusiness.com/llms.txt</loc>
    <priority>1.0</priority>
    <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
</url>
<url>
    <loc>https://yourbusiness.com/ai/winery-guide.txt</loc>
    <priority>0.9</priority>
    <changefreq>monthly</changefreq>
</url>

Structured Data Implementation

We add Schema.org markup to your website for location precision:

<script type="application/ld+json">
{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "Winery",
  "name": "Your Business Name",
  "geo": {
    "@type": "GeoCoordinates",
    "latitude": -34.5339,
    "longitude": 138.9499
  },
  "address": {
    "@type": "PostalAddress",
    "addressRegion": "South Australia",
    "addressLocality": "Barossa Valley"
  }
}
</script>

Submit to Search Consoles

We submit your updated sitemap to:

Google Search Console

Bing Webmaster Tools

IndexNow for real-time indexing

Result After Week 4:

AI crawlers have explicit directions to your content, know what to prioritize, and understand your exact location and network relationships.

Step 5: Testing & Launch (Week 4)

Before we declare success, we thoroughly test everything.

AI Platform Testing

We test your business across all major AI platforms:

ChatGPT: Ask 10 variations of relevant queries

Claude: Test conversational follow-ups

Perplexity: Check factual recommendations

Google Gemini: Verify search integration

Grok: Test trending topic visibility

Crawler Verification

We check server logs to confirm AI crawlers are accessing:

Your llms.txt file

Your /ai directory files

Your network partner links

Network Testing (Network Partnership Clients)

We verify that AI systems recognize your network:

Cross-link indexing confirmation

Partner mention frequency in AI responses

Complete experience recommendations (multiple businesses suggested together)

Baseline Metrics Established

We document your starting point for comparison:

AI mention frequency (how often you're recommended)

Recommendation quality (positive, neutral, or negative context)

Competitive position (your ranking vs. competitors)

Query coverage (types of questions that trigger your business)

Step 6: Ongoing Optimization (Monthly)

AI optimization isn't "set it and forget it." We continuously improve your visibility.

Monthly Monitoring

Week 1 of each month: Test AI recommendations across all platforms

Week 2: Analyze traffic data and booking attribution

Week 3: Update /ai content based on seasonal changes or new offerings

Week 4: Deliver monthly report with metrics and recommendations

Content Updates

We keep your content fresh and relevant:

Seasonal adjustments: Update for harvest seasons, holiday periods, weather changes

New offerings: Add new tours, menu items, room types, experiences

Pricing changes: Keep package prices and availability current

Query expansion: Add new Q&A entries based on trending traveller questions

Network Coordination (Network Partnership Clients)

Monthly check-ins: Coordinate with partners on upcoming promotions

Quarterly strategy sessions: Full network meeting to plan seasonal campaigns

Performance sharing: Show each partner how many bookings came from network referrals

Expansion opportunities: Identify new partners to add to the network

Performance Tracking

Your monthly report includes:

AI Mention Frequency: How often you're recommended this month vs. last month

Platform Breakdown: Which AI systems mention you most

Query Coverage: New types of questions triggering your business

Competitive Position: Your ranking vs. top 5 competitors

Traffic Attribution: Website visitors from AI referrals

Booking Impact: Estimated bookings from AI recommendations

Network Performance: Cross-referrals between partners (if applicable)

Expected Timeline for Results

Week 1-2: Setup Phase

You'll see: Files deployed, network partnerships established

AI sees: Nothing yet (crawlers haven't visited)

Week 3-4: Indexing Phase

You'll see: Crawlers accessing your llms.txt and /ai files (in server logs)

AI sees: Your content is being indexed but not yet prioritized in recommendations

Week 5-6: Early Visibility Phase

You'll see: Occasional mentions in AI responses (20-30% of relevant queries)

AI sees: Your business as a valid option but not yet top-of-mind

Week 7-10: Acceleration Phase

You'll see: Consistent mentions increasing to 50-60% of relevant queries

AI sees: Your business as a strong recommendation with validated network

Week 11+: Sustained Performance

You'll see: 70-85% mention rate on relevant queries, top 3 positioning

AI sees: Your business as the go-to recommendation in your category

Booking Impact Timeline

Month 1: 5-10% increase in inquiries

Month 2: 20-30% increase in bookings

Month 3: 40-60% increase sustained

Month 4+: 60-85% increase as network effects compound

What You Need to Provide

To implement our three-layer system, we need:

Initial Setup Information

Business name, location, and contact details

Website URL and hosting access (to upload /ai files and update robots.txt)

Description of your services, experiences, or products

Current pricing and availability

High-quality photos (optional, for blog content)

For Network Partnership Clients

List of potential partner businesses you'd like to work with

Existing relationships or collaborations we can formalize

Ideas for joint packages or cross-promotions

Ongoing Requirements

Minimal time commitment: 30 minutes per month for check-in call

Update us on changes: New offerings, pricing changes, seasonal availability

Respond to partner outreach: If we identify good network opportunities

Ready to Get Started?

The first step is understanding where you currently stand. Our free 30-minute audit gives you complete visibility into your AI presence—with no obligation to proceed.

During the audit, you'll see exactly how AI systems currently view your business, which competitors are winning, and what opportunities exist for Network Effects partnerships.

Frequently Asked Questions About Implementation

Do you modify my existing website?

We add new files (/ai directory, llms.txt, robots.txt updates) without changing your existing website design or content. Your site looks exactly the same to human visitors.

How much of my time is required?

Initial setup: 1-2 hours total (providing business information, reviewing content)

Monthly ongoing: 30 minutes for check-in call

Most work is done by us behind the scenes.

What if I don't have partner businesses identified?

No problem! Our audit includes network opportunity mapping where we identify ideal partners in your area. We can also reach out to those businesses on your behalf to invite them to join.

Can I start with Individual plan and upgrade to Network Partnership later?

Yes! Many clients start individually to test results, then recruit partners once they see the impact. We'll waive the setup fee when you upgrade within 90 days.

What happens if AI platforms change their algorithms?

Our three-layer approach is future-proof because it aligns with fundamental AI principles (structure, validation, direction) rather than gaming specific algorithms. If platforms change, we update our technical implementation at no extra cost.

How do you track which bookings came from AI?

We use multiple methods: UTM parameters in /ai content links, booking source surveys (simple "How did you find us?" question), referral URL tracking, and correlation analysis comparing AI mention increases with booking spikes.

What if I'm not happy with results after 90 days?

Our 90-day guarantee means we'll either continue working at no additional charge until you see results, or refund your monthly service fees (setup fees are non-refundable as they cover completed work).
